column4: how can i disable keyrings? whenever i open like various programmes it pops up a box telling me to unlock a keyring, so freaking annoying
but secure
secure from what? nobody else uses this computer
and nobody else has (physical) access to this computer?
no
computers can be stolen though...
and if they did, they wouldnt be able to do much, i have noting confidential here, pretty much just Blender 3D files and configuration stuff
there hasnt been a theft in this neighbourhood for years, and we are secure against that
you convinced me - you can change the password for the key ring to be empty
how?
open Applications/accessories/passwords and...
type seahorse at the terminal
but how do i change the pass to empty?
I was coming to that :-) select the tab "passwords", right click on passwords:login, select "change password"
you are welcome - take care :-)
didnt help at all :\
the link tells you how to troubleshoot problems with ./configure, but not make. there it just says 'if all goes well'
first question: are you certain you need to compile it yourself?
yes
to me it looks like there is an error in the sources - so please ask the author
well the author has put the programme on hiatus and is unavailable. It supposedly works fine, last time he checked it
